snippet.title: Mega Man Sunrise - Intro & Stage Select
snippet.description:
You can support both Mega Man AND me through Nexus: https://www.nexus.gg/megaquint
 Alright, back to the world of fangames with a rather unique one. This game takes on the aesthetic of the Game Boy games, complete with a new robot that fills the "Mega Man Killer" role, so to speak. But this bot is one of Dr. Light's creations, named Trance. And like he's prone to do, Wily ends up taking this robot for his own deeds as Trance puts the "Master" in Robot Master, since she can control other robots. So it's once again up to Mega Man to stop all this.

Also, don't be surprised if you recognize some of the music from other games.

__

Excited for the possibility of a new Mega Man X game? Join us on the X9 Discord: https://discord.gg/TceYUDq
Interested in netbattling against others in Battle Network? Join the N1GP Discord: http://discord.n1gp.net/
If you want to send a tip: https://streamlabs.com/megaquint
You can also follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/megaquint I don't post much, but here I am.
